content: Generate a list of 10 animals whose names start with the letter G.

I'd be happy to help you with that! Here's a list of 10 animals whose names start with the letter G:

1. Giraffe
2. Gorilla
3. Goose
4. Guinea pig
5. Gopher
6. Grasshopper
7. Gecko
8. Goldfish
9. Gerbil
10. Gray wolf

I hope this list meets your requirements. If you need any more information or have any other questions, please don't hesitate to ask!
